name: X0
description: What is the project about? $X0 is an unique and safe meme project and has the most zeros in price compared to any project in history. 100% Community Run, 0 Tax. It's a true meme in ever essence. What makes your project unique? Based on an interplay of X (an ode to our Lord Musk and his creation) and killing 0s. $X0 at its core represents coming together as a true community and striking off the zeros one at a time without worrying about marketcap. By burning 99.99% of supply, most of the dexes get glitched into showing extremely low marketcaps say sub $100. Thus ensuring the focus is only on zeros in price and killing them. Also all the decisions are run through telegram polls making it truly a community coin. History of your project. After being deployed any anon dev and leaving it to the community. The community banded together and took initiate and came up with graphics, memes, website entirely own their own. Even established a community wallet to further their cause. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Add unique gamified social elements like telegram ranks, daily tasks etc to widen the reach and add more supporters to the $X0 cause of killing zeros in its price. What can your token be used for? Presently its a pure meme. But at larger marketcaps, we would look at unique utilities taking into account the general sentiment of the community/holders.
